summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Tuesday 12 October to end of Wednesday 13 October GMT
description: Dry, settled weather is set to continue during Tuesday and Wednesday. A light north-westerly breeze will though bring a 'clean' feed of maritime air from the Atlantic while giving enough air movement to disperse local emissions.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
